origin_question: 某旅游公司计划推出单日最长游览路线，需确定景点网络中两处最远地点的最短路径长度。计算该数值以评估行程时间是否合理？
question: A travel company plans to launch the longest one-day tour route and needs to determine the shortest path length between the two furthest points in a network of attractions. Can this value be calculated to evaluate whether the travel time is reasonable?
